___vert_source.description: The source file for the GLSL vertex shader, relative to the current asset path. Defaults to vert.glsl

___parameters.description: The parameters (uniforms in GLSL) for the shader.

___name.description: The name that will be exposed to the interface

___glsl_name.description: The name of the uniorm in GLSL

___glsl_offset.description: The offset from the uniorm location fetched by glsl_name. Used for arrays, 0 by default

___default.description: The default value for the parameter

___frag_source.description: The source file for the GLSL frragment shader, relative to the current asset path. Defaults to frag.glsl

___location_attribute_glsl_name.description: The name of the vertex location attribute

___vertex_attributes.description: The vertex attributes that this shader expects. These are to be added to a mesh.

___name.description: The name of the attribute in the mesh.

___glsl_name.description: The name of the attribute in GLSL
